segments.text: So why is the face tilted to the right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This watch is supposed to be worn on your left hand .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So it's not as convenient for left-handed people ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's better for right-handed people like me . See , I don't even have to move my arm to see the time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm left-handed . You bought that watch so that I won't borrow it ...
segments.speaker: S2
